bibl.author: Louisa Van Velsor Whitman
bibl.title: Louisa Van Velsor Whitman to Walt Whitman, 25 November [1868]
bibl.orgName: The Trent Collection of Whitmaniana, Duke University Rare Book, Manuscript, and Special Collections Library

revisionDesc.change: corrected choice encoding in three places
Proofreading Corrections: Heyde dates and Silent Proof

Note Walt's Nov. 24 letter, proofreading corrections, George's house, placement of closer and postscript, and revise annotation on Mattie's visit, George's 50 dollars, Jeff's arrival, and Walt's inquiry on Portland house.
Review oral proofreading corrections, add date note and RMBucke hand note, annotate Thomas Davis and Jeff and Samuel W. Thayer and correct Helen Price annotation.
Clean encoding (editor, date, remove "_large") and add standard annotations on unannotated files (Jeff W, Martha [Mattie], George W, Lou Haslam)

body.p:
i received your letter to day wensday Wednesday and the one on saturday Saturday also and was particularly glad to get the letter and the contents as i was very short off of funds and as georgeyGeorgey had let mattyMatty have considerable before Jeffy came he wasent wasn't very flush but the 2 dollars helped me out on saturday Saturday and saturday Saturday night georgeGeorge gave me some so you see providence has provided) Jeffy is here came last friday Friday mattyMatty is better i think she went to new york New York yesterday and is quite smart much better than she was a few weeks ago Jeff and she talks of coming to washingtonWashington for a few days the first of next week Jeff will
write to inform you what day they will come) i have had several letters from heydeHeyde saying hannaHannah is gaining but her arm by his account seemesseems to be bad yet) have you wrote to Doctor theirThayer yet walterWalter if you receive a letter from him i wish you would send it to me) hellen priceHelen Price was here yesterday to dinner she says they think so strange strange you havent haven't wrote to them mrsMrs. price aint ain't very well but so she s she's around mrMr. Davis from providence has been to see them hellenHelen said he said your next vacation he hoped you would spent at his houshouse georgeGeorge has not commenced his house yet but is talking about it) i am pretty smart mattyMatty wont won't bring either of the pets

postscript.p: i write in a hurry as usual
